alert.note: Alert for Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 1:58PM MDT until June 07 at 2:45PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN PENNINGTON COUNTY... At 157 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sheridan Lake, or 6 miles northeast of Hill City, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Keystone Wye, Mount Rushmore National Memorial, Rockerville, Keystone, Bear Country, Reptile Gardens, Hayward and Hart Ranch. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
